name: To another planet
description:
To Another Planet is a game by Red Indie, made for the 3rd Beginners Circle Game Jam.

Programs we used:

  • Godot game engine
  • GIMP
  • Bsfxr
  • Bosca.ceoil

Please consider donating for better development of this and our other games.

Available for:

  • Windows
  • Mac
  • Linux

##############################################################

Welcome to space, cadet! Your mission is to secure one of our military base on another planet! Most of our veterans are busy a few light years away.

It's your turn to shine! Help us to retrieve the base from a tyrant alien. It might not be an easy task.

Goodluck, Cadet!

###############################################################

NOTE:

Arcade mode is currently still in development(The button may not be responsive). STAY TUNED!

Multiplayer mode coming soon

*Re-Uploaded to fix a major bug

Found a bug/glitch? Mail us! redindiegames@gmail.com
